text: The European Youth Table Tennis Championships were first held in 1955 in Stuttgart. The tournament has been held yearly (except 1960, 1963, 1964). Juniors (under 18) and Cadets (under 15).ETTU.org - General Information {| class="wikitable" Edition Year Host City Country Events (J+C) 1 1955 Stuttgart 5+0 2 1956 Opatija 6+0 3 1957 Donaueschingen 7+0 4 1958 Falkenberg 7+0 5 1959 Constanta 7+0 6 1961 Bad Blankenburg 7+0 7 1962 Bled 7+0 8 1965 Prague 7+0 9 1966 Szombathely 7+2 10 1967 Vejle 7+0 11 1968 Leningrad 7+2 12 1969 Obertraun 7+4 13 1970 Teeside 7+2 14 1971 Ostende 6+4 15 1972 Vejle 7+0 16 1973 Athens 7+0 17 1974 Göppingen 7+4 18 1975 Zagreb 7+4 19 1976 Mödling 7+4 20 1977 Vichy 7+4 21 1978 Barcelona 7+4 22 1979 Rome 7+4 23 1980 Poland 7+4 24 1981 Topolcany 7+4 25 1982 Hollabrunn 7+4 26 1983 Malmö 7+6 27 1984 Linz 7+6 28 1985 The Hague 7+6 29 1986 Louvain-la-Neuve 7+6 30 1987 Athens 7+7 31 1988 Novi Sad 7+7 32 1989 Luxembourg 7+7 33 1990 Hollabrunn 7+7 34 1991 Granada 7+7 35 1992 Topolcany 7+7 36 1993 Ljubljana 7+7 37 1994 Paris 7+7 38 1995 The Hague 7+7 39 1996 Frýdek-Místek 7+7 40 1997 Topolcany 7+7 ==References== ==Other websites== * ETTU Website Category:Sports competitions Category:Table tennis
